devdoc.details: Arbitrum bridge requires base fee for the fee calculation therefore the function may revert on evm implementations that do not support base fee

bridge(address,address,uint256).details: Due to `whenNotPaused` modifier, this function can only be called when the contract is not paused. The sender must have approved this contract.

params._to: address of the destination account on Arbitrum
params._token: address of the token to bridge

returns._0: true if this bridger can be used

params._SDL: The address of the SDL token
params._gasLimit: The gas limit for the outbound transfer
params._gasPrice: The gas price for the outbound transfer

returns._0: total gas cost for an outbound transfer

params.basefee: The basefee to use for the calculation

returns._0: total gas cost for an outbound transfer
gas limit to use for arbitrum outbound transfers
gas price to use for arbitrum outbound transfers

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only the owner can call this function and overriding contracts should implement `whenNotPaused` modifier to their bridge function

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._gasLimit: gas limit to store for the outbound transfer
params._gasPrice: gas price to store for the outbound transfer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only the owner can call this function

devdoc.title: Arbitrum bridger contract

UpdateSubmissionData(uint256[2],uint256[.notice: Event to emit when gas limit and gas price are updated

bridge(address,address,uint256).notice: Bridge tokens from the current chain to Arbitrum

check(address).notice: Check if this bridger can be used

cost().notice: Calculate the total gas cost for an outbound transfer

cost(uint256).notice: Calculate the total gas cost for an outbound transfer. Uses the provided base fee instead of the current base fee.

setSubmissionData(uint256,uint256).notice: Update the gas limit and gas price for outbound transfers

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to bridge tokens to Arbitrum
